post.author: Kelly J Lee
post.content:
Scene = loyalty program Cineplex.

I was able to see the Mist over the weekend for free.

Sign up at http://www.scene.ca/home.aspx and get 250 points.
Print out your temp membership card
After sign up, visit http://www.scene.ca/promo/giftcard, login and put in the following code 1070721 for an additional 1,000 points.
Visit http://link.p0.com/u.d?IGoQtnSgKiCfaTvo=11 and use the code 2070721 for another 1,000 points.
When you hit the theatres, show them your temp member card, they’ll deduct 1,000 points / ticket.

광고아닙니다.
회사 동료가 보내온겁니다. 저도 해봤어요 ^^
뭐...영화 티켓 비싸지 않으니까 뭐 그렇게까지 하시는 분들은 말구요 ^^
post.title: Free Movie with SCENE
